name: The Vorgy
description:
You've been invited to Tyranius mansion for a night of sex and feasting.  How will you hook up with the sexy specimens before you?

Features: 

  • ~20,000 words in this demo alone.
  • An engaging, sex-positive storyline with multiple branches!
  • One big mansion to explore at your leisure!  The demo features the entrance hall, and in the base game, we have the first floor, which has six rooms.  If we reach our stretch goals, we can unlock more!
  • A variety of people to romance, from furry beasts to human beings!  In our demo: Wilma, a cheeky retriever, and Denny, a shy human. The more this project makes, the more characters we can add to the mansion!
  • Choose your name, species, private parts, and pronouns! Be a sexual or asexual! Be a pred/prey, both, or neither!
  • Made in Twine, so it’s playable right in your browser!*
  • Achievements! Because why not?
